InstructionData.Title: Sorter POC
InstructionData.Description: Testing LimitNextExecutionByCount and FilterPrefabHashEquals Sorter internal memory instructions.â€‹
InstructionData.Author: MrDrummer25
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias Sorter d0 s Sorter Mode 1 # Any
move r0 3 sll r0 r0 8 #Shift it up eight bits or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.LimitNextExecutionByCount put Sorter 0 r0
move r0 HASH("ItemSteelIngot") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put Sorter 1 r0
move r0 3 sll r0 r0 8 #Shift it up eight bits or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.LimitNextExecutionByCount put Sorter 2 r0
move r0 HASH("ItemCopperIngot") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put Sorter 3 r0
